numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph collects data from two groups.
2. One group consists of people who are 15-24 years old.
3. One group consists of people who are 40 or more years old.
4. People in Mali show low expectation.
5. People in Brazil show low expectation.
6. I wonder why people in Mali show low expectation.
7. I wonder why people in Brazil show low expectation.
10. In this graph, young people are more likely than old people to say that the world is getting better with each generation.
